fields.name: output
fields.label: Output Port
fields.description: This parameter can specify what output port will be activated

fields.name: flag
fields.label: Flag
fields.description: This parameter is to set the output state to 0 (off) or 1(on) of the defined output port in the “Output Port” parameter.

fields.name: time
fields.label: Duración en ms (Milisegundo), 1segundo=1000ms
fields.description: The time when the output is generated, the unit is second, the value range is 0~65535; =0 is the infinite time output

fields.name: safe_speed
fields.label: Máxima Velocidad Km/h
fields.description: The speed limit of the action generated by the output port, the unit is km/h, and the value range is 0~255
